GOVERNMENT  AND  PUBLIC

IMSU  
   
   credit in Social Works and other relevant programme in  
addition to the UTME requirements.  
  
UTME  
(i) UYO requires at least 'O' level pass in Mathematics.  
(ii) PHC requires Economics, Government/History and any 
other Social Science or Arts subject.  
(iii) ABUAD and BE NIN require 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, History/Government and Mathematics.   
(iv) GOUU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at not more 
than two (2) sittings in subjects which include English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics and Government.  
(v) UNIOSUN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes obtained at 
not more than one (1) sitting  in English Language, 
Government and Mathematics and any other two (2) 
relevant subjects.  
(vi) CRAWFORD requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
English Language, Government and three (3) other subjects 
with at least a pass in Mathematics.    
(vii) WESTERN-DEL requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
including English Language, Mathematics, Government and 
one (1) other Social Science subject and other subject of 
choice.  
(viii) TSUJ requires 'O' level credit passes in English Language, 
History/Government, Mathematics and any two (2) or three 
(3) if Mathematics is not passed at credit level to include 
Economics, Geography, Christian Religious Studies /Islamic 
Studies, Commerce and Literature in English.  
(ix) NDA requires 'O' level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Government and any other two (2) of 
Economics, History, Geography, French, Literature in 
English, Christian Religious Studies / Islamic Studies and any 
Nigerian Language.  
(x) CUAB requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes or equivalents 
which must  include English Language,  Mathematics, and 
any other three (3) subjects as may be specified by each 
Faculty.  
(xi) ABUJA requires 'O' level credit passes to include English 
Language, Government and Mathematics.
